mama mulinma kament karapu ano.mama digatama me dennage wada diha balan hitiya.sahan kiyanne thamange paduwe blog ekak liyagena inna kenek.thakshanika dewal walata daksha kenek.boho pahadili kirim karala thiyenawa ithama saralawa.balapu hatiye kenekuta therum ganna puluwan widihata.eewata oone karana rupa satahan antharjalayen saha sahan wisin hadapu rupa dala thiyenawa.rupa pitin gaththa kiyala waradak naha.indika methana dapu rupe aragena thiyenneth net ekenne.indikage hasirima nam pahadili.thanikara irisiyawen inna kenek bawa pahadiliyi sahange blog eke natapu pissuwa dakkama.indikage hinamanaya saha manasika rogi thathwaya ithama pahadiliyi.mit pera abhitha edirisinhata karapu apahasa blog pura dakala athi ano kamentu magin.mohu thanikara proda karuwek.indika upashantha yanu manasika belahinathawayen pelena kenek bawa penewi ihatha link ekata giyama.wahama manasika prathikara sadaha yomu wanna indika.eya apata mahath aswasillak.oba wani putheku bihi kala mawata nigawak indika.ma mula sita me siyalla desa bala siti ano wemi.
